content: [onscreen:false]You reach the entrance of a cave and begin to hear that beautiful melody from your dreams..
[emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:false]You enter the cave and see a figure, she seems to be trapped, a fishing net tangled tightly around her tail and cutting into her scales...
[emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:false]She looks at you, large sad eyes that somehow look as though she has been crying even under water.
[emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:false]“P...please help me, diver... I cannot swim like this...”

content.option: [bad] Cut her free with your dive knife
[good] Untangle the net with your hands

content: [emotion:angry|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]You move quickly to cut her free of the net, but she lets out a terrified shriek at the sight of your knife, her tail lashing and knocking the blade from your hand...

content.option: “I’m just trying to help free you!”

content: [emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]It takes a few minutes but you manage to free her without causing her any further injury...
[sound:annoyed02|emotion:angry|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:false]“Yeah right! You were going to cut me!” She glares at you, trying to move back and away...

content.option: [bad] Pick up the knife and try again
[good] Raise your hands to show they’re empty

content: [sound:giggle01|emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]She giggles happily, swimming in a loop around you, enjoying her freedom. “Thank you so much, diver! I thought that was the end for me!”
[emotion:bigmad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]A flash of red appears in her eyes and she growls. “Don’t come near me!” She whips her tail again just as you cut at the net, freeing her...
[emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:false]She looks at both of your hands, then at the knife, sniffling lightly. “Okay... you can use it, just be careful!” She pouts, looking worried.

[emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]She immediately stops swimming around the cave to look at you. “I... I went too close to the surface again. Mother used to warn me... I never did listen to her.”
[emotion:happy|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]“Yes I did!” She nods, swimming close to you, picking up both your hands, holding onto them. “It was quite a beautiful tune wasn’t it?”
[emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:false]She looks at you once more, wiping at her eyes before taking off further down into the cave...

content.option: “Wait! I didn’t mean to scare you!”

content: [emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]You smile at her reassuringly and she nods smiling back. You carefully cut away at the net until her tail is free...
[emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]“I... I have to go! I shouldn’t be talking to you either!” She pouted, seeming as though she very much wanted to stay and talk to you...

[sound:giggle02|emotion:blush|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:false]Before you can ask her if she was the one singing it, she squeezes your hands. “Follow me! I can show you where it’s coming from!”
[emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:true|zoomin:false]You follow her, she had to know something about the song that was coming from the cave before. Or maybe it was her...
[sound:giggle03|emotion:happy|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]“Yay!” She giggles softly, swishing her tail one way and then the other, stretching it out. “Thank you, diver!”...
[emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:false]She shakes her head and before you can say more she is already swimming further into the cave...

[sound:giggle03|emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:false] Entranced, you nod at her and she giggles. “Good! This way!” In a flash of pink and blue scales she descends further into the cave for you to follow...

[sound:giggle02|emotion:happy|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:false] Before you can ask her about the music she swims around you once, patting the top of your helmet with her hand. In a flash of colorful scales she then darts off into the cave, her giggles echoing in the current...
[emotion:happy|onscreen:true|shadow:true|zoomin:false]Quickly you return your dive knife to it’s clip and begin swimming after her...
